name: videoautomaker
description: VideoAutoMaker is an automated AI-powered video generation pipeline that takes a script and turns it into fully-formed video segments with matching visuals, TTS audio, and metadata â€” ready for platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Bilibili.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n API,WEB -c blue,green "cross-env PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 PYTHONPATH=. ./venv/bin/python -m uvicorn api.api:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
